title: Handwriting font from Charles Tyrwhitt catalog
content:
Hi,

I'm wondering if anyone can identify the handwriting font in the attached sample I found in a Charles Tyrwhitt catalog.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724172403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thyritt_handwriting_3479.jpeg)
author: bfingeroth

comments.content:
Have not found it yet, but PT Script Zephyr could be substituted without being noticed by most people

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724172403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/PTScriptZephyrInUse_4508.jpg)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-script-zephyr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724172403/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-script-zephyr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/pt-script-zephyr/")  
don
it's very close! great job! thanks!
